CIPFilterTask Class Reference

This task loads the two ipfilter.dat files, a task that can take quite a while on a slow system with a large dat- file. More...

Detailed Description

This task loads the two ipfilter.dat files, a task that can take quite a while on a slow system with a large dat- file.

Member Function Documentation

bool CIPFilterTask::AddIPRange ( uint32  IPStart,
uint32  IPEnd,
uint16  AccessLevel,
const char *  DEBUG_ONLYDescription 
) [inline, private]

Helper function.

Parameters:
IPstart The start of the IP-range.
IPend The end of the IP-range, must be less than or equal to IPstart.
AccessLevel The AccessLevel of this range.
Description The assosiated description of this range.
Returns:
true if the range was added, false if it was discarded.

This function inserts the specified range into the IPMap. Invalid ranges where the AccessLevel is not within the range 0..255, or where IPEnd < IPstart not inserted.

References CIPFilterTask::rangeObject::AccessLevel, and CRangeMap< VALUE, KEYTYPE >::insert().

Referenced by LoadFromFile().

int CIPFilterTask::LoadFromFile ( const wxString &  file  )  [inline, private]

Loads a IP-list from the specified file, can be text or zip.

Returns:
True if the file was loaded, false otherwise.
